name: label
description: The label for the checkboxes field.

name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the checkboxes title (`xl`, `l`, `m` or `s`).

name: id
description: A unique ID for the checkboxes component.

name: name
description: The name of the form field.

name: hint
description: An optional hint to display above the form field.

name: error
description: If set, the details of any errors.

name: items
description: A list of checkbox items to render.

params.name: text
params.description: The label of the checkbox item.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the form field item. If set, this will override the main `name` property.

params.name: checked
params.description: If true, the checkbox will be checked.

name: inline
description: If true, show the checkboxes inline rather than vertical.

name: formGroupClasses
description: Classes to add to the checkboxes form group.

name: formGroupAttributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the checkboxes form group.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the checkbox elements.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the checkbox elements.
